title: WHERE'S KAYLE BOT?!
body:
Hello i saw {{champion:25}} in the bots list again in the match making (in PBE), and i was so happy but, WHERES {{champion:10}}  BOT?! please don't remove her as bot, i hope Riot see this, but i do understand that {{champion:10}} had been reworking and her ability is not the same, so im really hoping that Riot will put {{champion:10}} in the bots list again.

Just like that happen to Nunu (& Willump).

replies.body: Kayle bot is in game now :D
Im guessing they have to update her bot to understand her new kit first.
